Register a global external service with the OpenRemote manager

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-Forwarded-Proto","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}},{"name":"X-Forwarded-Host","in":"header","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["homepageUrl","label","serviceId","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"realm":{"type":"string","readOnly":true},"isGlobal":{"type":"boolean","readOnly":true},"serviceId":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"instanceId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"version":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"icon":{"type":"string"},"label":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"homepageUrl":{"maxLength":512,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["AVAILABLE","UNAVAILABLE"]}},"title":"ExternalService"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Service registered successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"required":["homepageUrl","label","serviceId","status"],"type":"object","properties":{"realm":{"type":"string","readOnly":true},"isGlobal":{"type":"boolean","readOnly":true},"serviceId":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"instanceId":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"version":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"icon":{"type":"string"},"label":{"maxLength":255,"minLength":1,"type":"string"},"homepageUrl":{"maxLength":512,"minLength":3,"type":"string"},"status":{"type":"string","enum":["AVAILABLE","UNAVAILABLE"]}},"title":"ExternalService"}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid external service object"},"409":{"description":"ExternalService instance already registered"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
